label: 飯炊
本: Servants, Shophands, and Laborers in the Cities of Tokugawa Japan . Princeton University Press . 1992
説明文: The term itself means rice-boiler" and suggests kitchen responsibilities....  But she might perform numerous other duties aside from cooking.  A Genroku-era description of her functions includes baby-sitting, chopping firewood, and aperating a kara-usu (pp. 50-51). [唐臼] "
